title: The Strongest Men of God
overview: A story revolving around a hero type protagonist worshiped like a god by his followers. They form a gaming team under his leadership and call themselves the Dragon Fight Team. Liu Chuan is an expert in the gaming circle who wins every competition that he joins. While he was at the peak of his career, his parents force him to return to school to finish his studies. Due to boredom, he secretly forms a new team with his friends Xu Ce, Lan Wei Ran, Qin Ye and Wu Ze Wen who have potential despite being amateurs. Through training and teamwork, the group slowly makes its way up to become the best of the best.
